extractedData.name: Nithish Kumar
extractedData.title: Software Development Engineer
extractedData.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented Software Engineer with a strong foundation in React, Node.js, and SQL. Proficient in building scalable and responsive web applications, crafting efficient backend solutions, and designing robust database systems. Adept at collaborating in team environments and leveraging problem-solving skills to deliver innovative and user-centric software solutions. Passionate about learning and staying updated with the latest technologies to drive impactful results.

experience.description: Developing and deploying software applications for various Clients
Developed Web Pages, Built Deep learning Projects

projects.name: EEEZO
projects.description: Developed dynamic and responsive web interfaces using React.js and Tailwind CSS to enhance user experience. Implemented seamless API integration to efficiently fetch and display backend data.

projects.name: Evoting
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end web application with six user login profiles, each having different levels of authorization. Contributed to developing responsive web pages and backend logic using Node.js and AJAX to fetch and display dynamic data.
